CustomField.formula: $Setup.Pulse_Survey_Configuration__c.Base_Url__c & '?c_id='& ClaimForRole__c & '&e_id='& ExposureForRole__c & '&time=' & TEXT( ROUND((now() - DATETIMEVALUE( "2020-01-01 12:00:00" )) * 24 * 60 * 60, 0 ) ) & $Setup.Pulse_Survey_Configuration__c.Timestamp_Anchor__c & '&pig_en=' & PIG_Logo_EN__c & '&pig_fr=' & PIG_Logo_FR__c
CustomField.label: Survey url
